credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
title: Sepulchral monument for poet Pietro Chiari
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash, graphite, on paper
description: In a wooded clearing a pedestal stands upon three steps. The lower plinth is inscribed with "CHIARI RAPI CHI (?) NIENTE/ PREZZA/I SUOI TALE(n)TI VENIRIANO (?) ANORA". A fluted urn surrounded by a band and with two genii holding a portrait medallion crowns the pedestal. Figures of women kneel at the four corners of the plinth below the pedestal.
name: Drawing
